entry.title: Nadezhda Stasova (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that near the end of her life, feminist and educator Nadezhda Stasova (pictured) wrote that Russian women "still have not learned to stop being men's slaves"?

entry.title: Jewish individuals and organizations played a pivotal role (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that Jewish individuals and organizations played a pivotal role in the civil rights movement?

entry.title: Geoffrey Holt (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that Geoffrey Holt, an unassuming New Hampshire man who worked as a groundskeeper in a mobile home park where he resided, left $3.8 million to his small town after his death?

entry.title: orange-billed lorikeets (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that young orange-billed lorikeets are actually yellow-billed?

entry.title: Pillar Point Bluff (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that the San Gregorio Fault comes ashore in only two places in northern California, one of which is between Pillar Point Bluff and Moss Beach?

entry.title: Matilda Cole (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that before embarking on a music career, Matilda Cole appeared in three of her father's films?

entry.title: Ngwa people (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that the Ngwa people are the largest clan in Igboland?

entry.title: TVX Broadcast Group (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that each station in the TVX Broadcast Group had exactly 37 employees?
